casebody.data:
Justin WILD, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
CARRIAGE FUNERAL HOLDINGS, INC., d/b/a Feeney Funeral Home, LLC, David B. Feeney, and Ginny Sanzo, Defendants-Petitioners. C-1043 September Term 2018
082836 Supreme Court of New Jersey. JULY 11, 2019

ORDER

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-003072-17 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is granted.
